mapper.select: SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo, ORIGINAL_NAME AS originalName, MEMBERP_NO AS memberpNo, TITLE AS title, CARE_AGE AS careBirth, LOCATION AS location, CARE_TYPE AS careType, START_DATE AS startDate, PAY AS pay, WRITE_DATE AS writeDate FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM (SELECT * FROM JOB_SEARCH_LIST WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY WRITE_DATE DESC) A) WHERE #{page}<=RNUM AND RNUM<=#{page}+9
